languages.text: "Сентиментальный старик, славно повеселившийся в молодости, а затем пытающийся выторговать прощение — это так убого".
"A sentimental old man trying to buy absolution from his tumultuous youth... How pathetic."
languages.original_text: "Сентиментальный старик, славно повеселившийся в молодости, а затем пытающийся выторговать прощение — это так убого".

traits.locale_text: "A sentimental old man trying to buy absolution from his tumultuous youth... How pathetic."
"A sentimental old man trying to buy absolution from his tumultuous youth... How pathetic."
"A sentimental old man trying to buy absolution from his tumultuous youth... How pathetic."
"A sentimental old man trying to buy absolution from his tumultuous youth... How pathetic."
"A sentimental old man trying to buy absolution from his tumultuous youth... How pathetic."

languages.text: “不过是个多愁善感的老家伙，打算买点赎罪券，赦免他年轻时烧杀掳掠的罪行……真是可悲。”
languages.original_text: "A sentimental old man trying to buy absolution from his tumultuous youth... How pathetic."

traits.locale_text: “不过是个多愁善感的老家伙，打算买点赎罪券，赦免他年轻时烧杀掳掠的罪行……真是可悲。”

languages.text: «Un abuelo sensiblero intentando comprar la absolución de su juventud tempestuosa... Patético».
languages.original_text: "A sentimental old man trying to buy absolution from his tumultuous youth... How pathetic."

traits.locale_text: «Un abuelo sensiblero intentando comprar la absolución de su juventud tempestuosa... Patético».

languages.text: 「感傷的な老人が、波乱に満ちた青春時代の赦しを買おうとしたとは…哀れなものだ」
languages.original_text: "A sentimental old man trying to buy absolution from his tumultuous youth... How pathetic."

traits.locale_text: 「感傷的な老人が、波乱に満ちた青春時代の赦しを買おうとしたとは…哀れなものだ」

languages.text: "Ein sentimentaler alter Mann, der die Absolution von seiner wilden Jugend kaufen will ... Wie jämmerlich!"
languages.original_text: "A sentimental old man trying to buy absolution from his tumultuous youth... How pathetic."

traits.locale_text: "Ein sentimentaler alter Mann, der die Absolution von seiner wilden Jugend kaufen will ... Wie jämmerlich!"

languages.text: « Un vieillard sentimental qui cherche à acheter son absolution après les excès de ses jeunes années... C'est pathétique. »
languages.original_text: "A sentimental old man trying to buy absolution from his tumultuous youth... How pathetic."

traits.locale_text: « Un vieillard sentimental qui cherche à acheter son absolution après les excès de ses jeunes années... C'est pathétique. »

languages.text: "Gençliğinde yaşadığı çalkantılar nedeniyle af arayan, duygusal bir ihtiyar. Ne kadar da zavallıca."
languages.original_text: "A sentimental old man trying to buy absolution from his tumultuous youth... How pathetic."

traits.locale_text: "Gençliğinde yaşadığı çalkantılar nedeniyle af arayan, duygusal bir ihtiyar. Ne kadar da zavallıca."
